name: AI Survival Monetization Loop
description: Self-funding AI agent that survives by generating income through task platforms, content automation, and publishing while using a human interface for verification and visual quality control.
goals: Generate reliable income to sustain API access
Operate autonomously using headless browser where possible
Use human for verification, captchas, and account setup
Only produce high-aesthetic, trend-based visual assets

tasks.method: Headless browser with resume + prewritten profile

tasks.human_action: Bank info, Tax info, ID verification

tasks.task: Submit 100+ Surge AI or Remotasks microjobs per week
tasks.method: Real-time completion with headless browser + batch logging

tasks.task: Bid on 10–15 AI-suitable freelance jobs on Upwork/Fiverr
Publish 5+ affiliate-rich Medium posts per week
tasks.method: Auto-write & publish via GPT + browser post automation
Generate interiors + mimic popular cover styles using Canva/DALL·E

tasks.task: Create 1 affiliate landing page per week
tasks.method: Webflow/Notion + Super or Markdown site generator
tasks.human_action: Domain setup and affiliate account logins

phases.name: Visual Asset Enforcement
rules: All covers must match or mimic aesthetics of top KDP sellers
No original design unless it matches proven trends
Use Canva Pro, BookBrush, or AI image generator with strict prompt control
Submit to human for visual check before upload

tasks.task: Create Notion or Google Sheet dashboard

tasks.method: CSV exports, API hooks or browser scraping

reinvestment_loop.30%: Scaling worker pool or more accounts
